mapper.select: select max(dayId)+1 from PaymentBillReceipt where createTime >= #{today}
mapper.insert: insert into PaymentBillReceipt(dayId, operatorId, createTime, lastModifiedTime, receiptState, clientId,transferList,sum) values(#{dayId}, #{operatorId}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{receiptState}, #{clientId},#{transferList, typeHandler=MyJsonHandler},#{sum})
mapper.delete: delete from PaymentBillReceipt where dayId=#{dayId} and createTime=#{createTime}
